definition: wheel/disk/ring/steamship/to take turns/to rotate/by turn/classifier for big round objects: disk, or recurring events: round, turn

son/child/seed/egg/small thing/1st earthly branch: 11 p.m.-1 a.m., midnight, 11th solar month (7th December to 5th January), year of the Rat/Viscount, fourth of five orders of nobility 五等爵位[wu3 deng3 jue2 wei4]/ancient Chinese compass point: 0° (north)

sentences.english: That’s because the friction of the wheels and track slowly drain energy away from the train.
sentences.chinese: 這是因爲輪子與軌道的摩擦力會逐漸削弱車體的能量。

sentences.english: The wheel is reinvented again and again.
sentences.chinese: 我們一次又一次地發明輪子。

sentences.english: We need two wheels, a long rope. Do you have any?
sentences.chinese: 我們需要兩個輪子和一條長繩。你們有嗎？

sentences.english: .. Inventing the wheel--it seems, what could be more obvious than a wheel?
sentences.chinese: 發明輪子這看起來，有什麼東西會比輪子更常見呢？

sentences.english: .. Inventing the wheel--it seems, what could be more obvious than a wheel?
sentences.chinese: 發明輪子這看起來，有什麼東西會比輪子更常見呢？

sentences.english: The wheel travels along this bar.
sentences.chinese: 輪子順着這根滑竿移動。

sentences.english: When I stop with motorbikes , it would appeal to me to go four wheels for many years.
sentences.chinese: 當我停止摩托車，它將呼籲我去四個輪子多年。

sentences.english: Some think they look good on 20-inch wheels.
sentences.chinese: 有人認爲它們陪20英寸的輪子還是不錯的。

sentences.english: The gravel under their wheels was new and smoothly raked.
sentences.chinese: 在它們輪子下的碎石還是新鋪的，耙得很均勻。

sentences.english: Know how deep your crankbait is running with the rod and reel setup you're using.
sentences.chinese: 通過的你竿子和輪子來感知crank下潛的深度。

sentences.english: In movies and on TV, wheels appear to rotate in reverse.
sentences.chinese: 在電影和電視中，輪子看起來似乎是反向轉動的。

sentences.english: It is in essence a teleconferencing system on wheels.
sentences.chinese: 它本質上是一個有輪子的遠程會議系統。

sentences.english: Instead of rolling your own, it is advisable to use common plug-ins.
sentences.chinese: 避免你自己重複造輪子，建議你去使用通用的插件。

sentences.english: Four, Spinner wheels allow for upright rolling in multiple directions.
sentences.chinese: 錠牀工人輪子考慮到挺直輾壓在多個方向。

sentences.english: Half way there, one of his car wheels came off.
sentences.chinese: 半道上他的一個汽車輪子掉了。

sentences.english: You mustn't rotate the wheel with your hand.
sentences.chinese: 你千萬不要用手轉動輪子。

definition: to rotate (about an axis)/to revolve/to turn/to move in a circle/to gyrate
car door/door of bus, railway carriage etc
